title: Polynomial Functions - Rewriting and Solving - Part B

content.question: Part B The function <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>k</mi> </math> is given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4310@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
